body_html:
@EmGarr
it's surprising that it doesn't even work after a source install.
I cant find anything obviously wrong, unfortunately.
Is there any chance that I can ssh into this machine? Considering that the situation is supposed to be operational, but it is not, and it's a basic code that's failing, I am running out of ideas.

@EmGarr 
it's surprising that it doesn't even work after a source install.
I cant find anything obviously wrong, unfortunately.
Is there any chance that I can ssh into this machine? Considering that the situation is supposed to be operational, but it is not, and it's a basic code that's failing, I am running out of ideas.
